revised_title: Crop Improvement in the 1990s: Breeding and Genetic Engineering
tldr: This article discusses the importance of crop improvement through breeding and genetic engineering in the 1990s. It highlights the challenges and advancements in plant breeding, including the use of technology, such as mechanical, electronic, and genetic methods. The article also explores the potential impact of biotechnology on agriculture and its applications in plant breeding.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Breeding
